Name: The Journey to Fairytales
About the game: Main: The Journey to Fairytales is a 3D puzzle-platformer adventure game. The primary character is a Sam, who was stolen by Baga-Yaga to the world of fairy tales. It is necessary to help him to escape from her. Climb the world, solve puzzles, secrets, defeat enemies in mini-games, control the mini robots, and much more!
